document_data.name: Heltharn Depository
document_data.mainbody: The '''Heltharn Depository''' was a vault in [[New Sarshell]] as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Construction: The structure was three stories tall, bristling with defensive stonework. There were letters carved atop the lintel, announcing it was named "Heltharn Depository". The building faced a street.
document_data.Services: Heltharn Depository held on to coin for a fee.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1396}}, [[Seren Juramot]] had been using the depository to store the money she sought to use to buy her freedom from [[Thay]] after the loss of her enclave's funds in [[Raven's Bluff]] during the [[Spellplague]]. That year, however, after [[Xxiphu]] rose from the depths, Seren found the ogres that usually kept watch at the front door missing; she inquired with other customers, and learned they claimed to have appointed [[Morgenthel]] as its new Master of Coins.
document_data.Defenses: Besides the defensive stonework, two ogres generally guarded the entrance. Inside, a number of protective wards and charms were active.
